The people who mistake different parts o: The person who mistakes branches and leaves for heartwood
The person who mistakes shoots for heartwood
The person who mistakes bark for heartwood
The person who mistakes softwood for heartwood
The things that are better and finer tha: The dimension of neither perception nor non-perception
The cessation of perception and feeling
